title: Just Like that Movie!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Good afternoon, Mari-san. Thank you for the invitation!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Welcome! I’ve been waiting for you~ Alright, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Huh? But I just got here... Where are we going!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I’ll be hosting you in this room, Shizuku!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I-Isn’t this a suite!? N-n-n-no way! I don’t have that kind of money!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Didn’t I tell you I’d be inviting you somewhere today~♪ And besides, I wanted to do something here together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I didn’t know your “invitation” meant taking me to such an amazing place... What did you want to do together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Why don’t we study some upper-class etiquette like that movie we watched before?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Huh? You mean stuff like... balancing books on top of our heads?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yeah! I think that doing that here could be fun and exciting! Come join in the fun, Shizuku!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>In that case, of course! Let’s practice dancing and bowing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
